recipesJson.name: Strawberry Pastry #Mixenvixens
recipesJson.author: corvape
recipesJson.description:
This is version 2 of this profile attempt and I am very happy with it
The pastry base uses JF biscuit and wf croissant to try and achieve a light buttery flaky pastry
I decided to go with FLV vanilla pudding for that gooey stuff in the pic. It adds a nice vanilla note and some mouth feel
Jf Sweet strawberry and FA juicy strawberry to go for a sweet realistic strawberry 
And WF powdered sugar because it’s on the pastry.
I added .25% cap super sweet to make these delicious flavors pop but feel free to omit if that’s not your thing.

reviews.text: This stuff right here is straight up vape crack. So so delicious and very accurate profile. Taste just like vaping the picture. My only complaint is that I like it better fresh a lot more than steeped for some odd reason. That being said, no biggie I just make what I'll vape in a day or two. I've mixed 30 ml of this at least 4 times in the last few weeks. Love it.
